arts.ttl: WhoScored's FA Cup Team of the Round: Marco Asensio, Marcus Rashford, Bruno Fernandes
arts.sum: Aston Villa duo Marco Asensio and Marcus Rashford both make the WhoScored FA Cup Team of the Round following their respective performances in Friday’s 2-0 win over Cardiff. Fulham, Crystal Palac...

arts.ttl: Aston Villa take control of Club Brugge tie with Champions League late show
arts.sum: Unai Emery’s side look firmly on course for a quarter-final showdown with either Liverpool or Paris Saint-Germain

arts.ttl: Aston Villa score twice late on to take control of tie against Club Brugge
arts.sum: Brandon Mechele’s 82nd-minute own goal was followed by Marco Asensio’s penalty six minutes later as Villa grabbed the tie with both hands.

arts.ttl: Unai Emery delighted with Tyrone Mings’ redemption against Club Brugge
arts.sum: Mings made a sensational goal-saving clearance which swung the balance of the match

arts.ttl: 'Unfinished business' - Mings redemption has Villa dreaming
arts.sum: From the "biggest mistake" to an "incredible" performance against Club Brugge - Tyrone Mings helps Aston Villa take a huge step towards the Champions League quarter-finals.

arts.ttl: Unai Emery singles out Aston Villa hero for tribute after huge Champions League win
arts.sum: Aston Villa have one foot in the quarter-finals of European football's premier club competition after a 3-1 win over Club Brugge in Belgium, with the second leg at Villa Park to come next week

arts.ttl: Why VAR checked Aston Villa penalty vs Club Brugge as Matty Cash point made
arts.sum: VAR checked Aston Villa's late penalty against Club Brugge to see whether the ball went out of play in the build-up. Why VAR checked Aston Villa penalty vs Club Brugge as Matty Cash point made

arts.ttl: Unai Emery singles out Aston Villa star for big praise after 3-1 win at Club Brugge
arts.sum: Unai Emery has praised Tyrone Mings’ colossal display in Aston Villa’s 3-1 win over Club Brugge in the first leg of their Champions League round of 16 tie. Unai Emery singled out Tyrone Mings for praise after his key contributons in the win over Club Brugge at the Jan Breydel Stadium

arts.ttl: Aston Villa star claims Champions League redemption as Unai Emery changes pay off
arts.sum: Aston Villa have taken a real stranglehold on their Champions League last 16 tie with Club Brugge after claiming a 3-1 first leg victory in Belgium, to put Unai Emery's men on the verge of the quarter-finals

arts.ttl: Aston Villa hero spotted with fans at Club Brugge after heroic Champions League moment
arts.sum: Marc Albrighton was spotted in the Aston Villa away end during their Champions League tie against Club Brugge . Aston Villa defeated Club Brugge 3-1 in the Champions League round of 16 first leg on Tuesday evening - and there was a familiar face in their away end.
